job.title: Senior Software Engineer
job.description: <p>We are looking for a hardworking, innovative, and goal driven Senior Software Engineer to join our Enterprise Information Management team for a new HTML &amp; Angular project. The ideal candidate will have excellent front-end and Angular development skills, including developing new user interfaces from scratch. Candidates should possess complementary skills on the back-end API and database layers.</p><p><br></p><p>Remote candidates are acceptable, with a preference for local candidates in the Las Vegas or Henderson, NV area.</p><p><br></p><p><br></p><p>Responsibilities:</p><p>• Develop quality Enterprise Information Management software utilizing Microsoft software development languages and tools.</p><p>• Create software designs for enhancements or features based on best practices.</p><p>• Participates in code and design reviews. Makes updates based on review recommendations.</p><p>• Keeps current on latest Microsoft development products.</p><p>• Provide support and maintenance on existing applications with the assistance of more experienced engineers as needed.</p><p>• Documents and demonstrates solutions by developing documentation, flowcharts, layouts, diagrams, charts, code comments and clear code with the assistance of more experienced engineers as needed.</p><p>• Demonstrate code quality through proper unit and other testing.</p><p>• Break down user stories into component tasks and provide estimates with the assistance of more experienced engineers as needed.</p><p>• Work in a collaborative development environment with a team of developers.</p><p><br></p><p><br></p><p>The above statements are intended only to describe the general nature of the job, and should not be construed as an all-inclusive list of position responsibilities.</p><p><br></p><p>Requirements:</p><p>• Previous Software Engineering experience (6+ years).</p><p>• Front End Development </p><p> o HTML5 (5+ years).</p><p> o CSS3 (5+ years).</p><p> o Angular 6+ (4+ years).</p><p>• Back End Development </p><p> o .Net/.Net Core/C#/EF/MSSQL experience (5+ years).</p><p> o C# (5+ years).</p><p> o ASP.NET (5+ years).</p><p> o SQL Server 2008/12/16+ (6+ years).</p><p>• Visual Studio 2015+ / Visual Studio Code (5+ years).</p><p>• Object Oriented Programming (OOP) and software patterns.</p><p>• Basic understanding of agile software development principles and techniques. Understand iterative software development.</p><p>• Basic understanding of the software development lifecycle and multiple software development approaches.</p><p>• Desire to be part of a highly productive, fast-paced team.</p><p>• Four-year college degree or equivalent. </p><p>• Organized and detail-oriented.</p><p>• Working knowledge of Git version control system.</p><p>• Experience working on a Scrum team</p><p><br></p><p><br></p><p>Preferred:</p><p>• Knowledge of third-party JavaScript libraries (RxJS, Ngrx, Angular Material, etc)</p><p>• Knowledge of credit union and/or banking industry.</p><p><br></p><p>The above statements are intended only to describe the general nature of the job, and should not be construed as an all-inclusive list of position responsibilities.</p><p><br></p><p>Employee Polygraph Protection Act</p><p>Equal Employment Opportunity </p><p>Family and Medical Leave Act</p><p><br></p><p>Alogent is an Equal Opportunity/Affirmative Action employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability, or protected Veteran status.</p>
